name: Wild West Rollout
description:
This game is a basic shooter, with a twist! The more you shoot with left mouse button the more your revolver starts to spin! You can hold it in place with the right mouse button but be aware that increases the likeability of jamming the weapon.

Barrels contain healthkits.

Try to defeat as much fiends as possible before you loose all your dice!

Game made almost entirely by me

Soundeffects: https://orangestone.itch.io/. Some art from https://opengameart.org/ esp. https://opengameart.org/users/medicinestorm
